org.apache.derby.jdbc

Interface ClientXADataSourceInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClientDataSourceInterface, javax.sql.CommonDataSource, javax.sql.DataSource, java.sql.Wrapper, javax.sql.XADataSource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicClientXADataSource40, ClientXADataSource, ClientXADataSource40

    public interface ClientXADataSourceInterface
extends ClientDataSourceInterface, javax.sql.XADataSource
    Specifies Derby extensions to the java.sqlx.XADataSource.
